sent.orig: I am single, I have no real girlfriend, only an E-girlfriend, that is you.
sent.trans: 我孤身一人，现实生活中没有女朋友，只有一个网上恋人，就是你啦！

sent.orig: My girlfriend slapped me because I accidentally called her the name of my previous girlfriend.
sent.trans: 我的女朋友拍打我，因为我无意中叫她我前任女朋友的名字。

sent.orig: PS: If your girlfriend dislikes you because of this, I don't think she is your girlfriend.
sent.trans: 如果您的女朋友烦恶您因此，我不认为她是您的女朋友。

sent.orig: Possibility you are the first of my girlfriend, real girlfriend.
sent.trans: 可能你是我的第一个女友，真正的女友。

sent.orig: I'm staying with my girlfriend and her family for two months.
sent.trans: 我要和我的女朋友和她的家人在一块两个月。
